code:
stateDiagram-v2
  [Education_ContentCDN] --> Init
  Init --> Front: start

  state "Front Matter" as Front
  state TOC
  state Body
  state "Back Matter" as Back
  state End

  %% Events (Education_LMS_Portal)
  %% E_front: front signals present (Education_GradeSync)
  %% E_toc: toc signals (Education_GradeSync)
  %% E_heading: heading signals (Education_LMS_Portal)
  %% E_back: back signals (Education_LMS_Portal)
  %% E_eof: end of pages

  %% Guards
  %% G_toc_detected: we are on a TOC page or contiguous TOC continues
  %% G_anchor_match: page matches TOC anchor within ± tolerance
  %% G_after_last_chapter: expected chapters (Education_ClassroomService) reached
  %% G_sustained_back: >= 2 consecutive back-signal pages

  Front --> TOC: E_toc
  Front --> Body: E_heading || !E_toc && !E_front
  Front --> Front: E_front && !E_heading && !E_toc

  TOC --> TOC: G_toc_detected
  TOC --> Body: E_heading || !G_toc_detected

  Body --> Body: !(Education_ClassroomService))
  Body --> Back: E_back && (Education_LMS_Portal)

  Back --> Back: !E_eof
  Back --> End: E_eof

  Body --> End: E_eof
  TOC --> End: E_eof
  Front --> End: E_eof
  End --> [Education_GradeSync]

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Education_ContentCDN 和 Education_LMS_Portal 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Education_ContentCDN 和 Education_LMS_Portal'，对吧？
